concept.title: 5153.303-5 Format for a justification and approval for other than full and open competition.

conbody.p: The J&A for other than full and open competition Template is located in the Army Templates and Guides on PAM.

p.b: The Template is mandatory for all justifications and approvals (J&As) in support of other than full and open competition. Contracting officer will tailor the J&Aâ€™s format to accommodate other type justifications in accordance with the FAR approval thresholds and required content.
